title: Ping problems only when I start a game
body:
Hi! So I was going about my games today and at first nothing was wrong then out of nowhere every time I went into a game my ping would go out of control and I don't know why so i'm asking for help ASAP to figure out what is wrong. I went on lolping.com in order to see if it involved league and I found that in the picture below, my ping was fine but as soon as I started a game major spikes occurred. Please help!

http://imgur.com/a/SZigB

replies.body: I'd recommend using our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) instead to get an overview of your specific issue.  It sounds to me like your network is having trouble holding a steady connection to the game server, so I suggest starting out with the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  The steps there should fix things up!
